description:
Ever wondered how to run an email marketing campaign?

In this course you will learn the exact steps that businesses use to build a list and send emails.

And all of this can be done without programming or coding! So…

No prior experience is required…

No programming experience is necessary…

We’ll get started from the basics and by the end of this course you will be able to setup your own entire email marketing system.

You will learn which tools to use and how to get started building your list.

We will cover how to send your emails to your list, and how you can schedule emails for a future date.

As a really important feature of email marketing you will learn how to setup your emails so that they are sent out on autopilot.

You will learn where to put your opt in forms on your website (ie. sign up forms) so that you get a maximum number of subscribers to your list.

I will also reveal to you how to create beautifully designed landing pages without programming. These are web pages that are designed exclusively for capturing users email addresses.

And more…

So if you want to get started with setting up your first list and sending emails then this course can help you!

Enrol today and I’ll see you inside the course.
title: Beginners Toolbox for Email Marketing
